EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-LEAD-GEN-FOLLOW-UP-PROGRAM.Trevor - 1B
EmailTemplate.subject: Teladoc Health: Follow-Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
Thank you for your recent interest in Teladoc Health. I'm reaching out to provide an overview of our comprehensive virtual care solution: Teladoc Health Intro Video (https://view.highspot.com/viewer/603d6de2a2e3a92b922515aa) (30 seconds). As the global leader in virtual care, the Teladoc Health solution uniquely spans telehealth, mental health, expert medical services, dermatology, guidance and support services with a vast network of board-certified physicians extensively trained in virtual care delivery.
We would love to discuss your virtual healthcare strategy, and how we can help you drive greater telehealth engagement. To begin our introduction, please feel free to directly schedule a 15-minute call here: https://calendly.com/trevorgarrison/introduction?utm_campaign=atmd-lead-outreach&utm_medium=email&utm_source=marketo&utm_content=email-1b
Regards, Trevor
Trevor Garrison Lead Development Representative Teladoc Health, Inc.
O (612) 999-7525 tgarrison@teladochealth.com
